[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”61864″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

VOLUNTEERING INITIATIVES

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1684312124035{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

At the University of West Attica we strongly believe that the social offer constitutes one of the utmost values ​​for the  οperation  of the contemporary societies.

Millions of people around the world offer voluntarily their services to their fellows who need their help. The mission of the “Volunteering Initiatives” is to provide a high level of volunteer services  to the community of the University of West Attica as well as to the wider society of the Western  Attica region, taking into account their contemporary  sustainable needs.

more infos : https://volunteers.uniwa.gr/

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
